decrease 2 single_crochet 2 x4 single_crochet 2 stub the head round 17 decrease 2 single_crochet 1 x4 round 18 decrease 6 round 19 decrease 3 fasten ob leave a long tail for sewing crown spike large round 1 take gold yellow yarn slip_stitch into any post just below the blo on the face single_crochet 7 ch1 turn 7 sts round 2 decrease 1 single_crochet 5 ch1 turn 6 sts round 3 decrease 1 single_crochet 4 ch1 turn 5 sts round 4 decrease 1 single_crochet 3 ch1 turn 4 sts round 5 decrease 1 sc2 ch1 turn 3 sts round 6 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 ch1 turn 2 sts round 7 decrease 1 1 sts fasten ob weave in the end along the side of the crown spike large repeat round 1-7 to make a crown spike large on either side of your first crown spike large after you complete your crown spikes large move onto crown spike small crown spike small round 1 take gold yellow yarn where there is still free space on the face slip_stitch next to one of the crown spike large you just crocheted single_crochet 5 ch1 turn 5 sts round 2 decrease 1 single_crochet 3 ch1 turn 4 sts round 3 decrease 1 sc2 ch1 turn 3 sts round 4 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 ch1 turn 2 sts round 5 decrease 1 1 sts fasten ob weave in the end along the side of the crown spike small repeat round 1-5 next to the other crown spike large face detailing eyes and mouth take your black yarn and tapestry needle sew two horizontal line across the 2nd and 3rd row from the center of your mc this will be the eyes sew a small triangle just below the center of your mc this will be mouth face detailing long tattoo make 2 round 1 take black yarn chain 11 turn 11sts round 2 starting at second loop from hook single_crochet 10 10 sts fasten ob leave a tail for sewing face detailing short tattoo make 2 round 1 take black yarn chain 4 turn 4 sts round 2 starting at second loop from hook single_crochet 3 3 sts fasten ob leave a tail for sewing using your tapestry
